#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

char a[110], b[101];

int main ( )
{
    memset ( a, '0', sizeof ( a ) ); memset ( b, '0', sizeof ( b ) );
    while ( scanf ( "%s %s", &a, &b ) == 2 )
    {
        if ( a[0] == '0' and b[0] == '0' and a[1] == '\0' ) {return 0;} int ans = 0, carry = 0;;
        reverse ( a, a+strlen(a) ); reverse ( b, b+strlen(b) );
        for ( int i = 0; i <= 20; ++ i )
        {
            if ( !a[i] ) a[i] = '0'; if ( !b[i] ) b[i] = '0';
            if ( (a[i]-'0') + (b[i]-'0') + carry >= 10 ) ++ ans;
            carry = ((a[i]-'0') + (b[i]-'0') + carry)/10;
        }
        if ( ans == 1 ) {printf ( "%d carry operation.\n", ans );continue;}
        if ( ans > 1 ) {printf ( "%d carry operations.\n", ans );continue;}
        printf ( "No carry operation.\n" );
    } return 0;
}
